mapper.select: SELECT room.room_id, CASE WHEN booking.booking_time IS NOT NULL and booking.checkout_time IS NULL THEN false ELSE true END AS status, Case When booking.user_id = #{user_id} Then true else false end as booked FROM public.room AS room LEFT JOIN public.booking AS booking ON room.room_id = booking.room_id AND booking.checkout_time IS NULL order by room.room_id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking (user_id, room_id, booking_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{roomId}, #{date}) ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT unique_booking DO NOTHING;
